tab1.text1:
INTRODUCTION
As a family friendly server ran by experienced staff, Terra Natura takes pride in helping Ark players new and old to feel welcome. We aim to appeal to those who are looking for the true Ark experience with the exception of a few boosts that improve quality of life. Make yourself feel at home and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it. We hope you enjoy your stay with us!

CURRENCY
We have a BerryBush seed currency which can be found by killing various dinos, many more can be found when killing alphas and bosses! You can use this currency to purchase tames, items and recolours over on Discord.

COMMUNITY CENTRE
The Island's CC is located at: TBC

STARTER KIT
Claim your starter kit at the Community Centre. Each player is limited to one starter kit.

DISCORD: http://discord.gg/Z9vv88GykB
Joining our Discord is not mandatory (just highly recommended)! Below are some things joining our Discord offers:
- Server Information, Updates and Announcements
- Ticket Support
- Reporting Players, Bugs etc
- Admin Shop
- Marketplace
- Donation Packs
- Events & Giveaways

Controller players need to hold square(PS) or x(XBOX) to see this message again.

tab2.text1:
Below are our rules:

CHARACTERS AND TRIBES
- The default names Human or Humano are not allowed. If you made this mistake please contact an admin on Discord for it to be changed.
- You must create a tribe even if you are solo.

BEHAVIOUR AND COMMON COURTESY
- Do not pick players up on a flyer with intent to harm them.
- Do not harass, stalk or be abusive towards any player.
- Use of racist or highly offensive language in chat will result in a ban.

BUILDS, BASES AND TAMES
- Pick up all traps after use.
- Keep your base within a (TBC) foundation radius in all directions.
- One base per tribe per map. This includes water pens, we plan on adding a public water pen for all to use.
- Keep our obelisks and community centres free from tames, storage boxes etc.
- Do not block access to artifact caves, high resource spawns or anywhere players need to go.

Discord is not a requirement but joining and registering will serve as your insurance. http://discord.gg/Z9vv88GykB.

DISCLAIMER:
Unregistered or incorrectly registered rule-breakers will not be warned by admin, instead we will take action without contacting you. This could mean we destroy your tames left at a cave entrance, we destroy a second base or we wipe you completely if the issues are severe enough. This is because we don't want to waste our time chasing rule-breakers when we could simply send you a polite message on Discord or speak with you in a ticket.
